title: Bug 17894 - Open Mode preference not reset by Restore Defaults
description: When we go to the Workbench preferences and change the Open Mode to Single Click, and select both checkboxes, clicking on 'Restore Defaults' does not reset the Open Mode preference to Double Click and clear both checkboxes.
OB: The Open Mode preference is not being reset to Double Click and the checkboxes are not being cleared when clicking on 'Restore Defaults' in the Workbench preferences.
SR: The Open Mode preference should be reverted to Double Click and both checkboxes should be cleared when clicking on 'Restore Defaults' in the Workbench preferences.
